title: Arktos Meadery Gaming Event
content:
During JAFAX this year Arktos Meadery and the Cellar of Tales will be holding a special event for JAFAX weekend. Presenting - Demon Slayer: Blood Moon - A tabletop role playing experience in the world of Demon Slayer!

This special event is going to be held off-site from the main convention at Arktos Meadery, so to find out more about it, take a look at our Gaming Events page!
